name: 林鈞陶
objective:
此課程主要探討現代機率基本知識，包含以下主題：機率空間；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數；中央極限定理。
This course will be focused on the basic knowledge of probability, including the following topics: sample space; random variables; expected value and moment; joint distributed random variables; moment generating function; central limited theory.
schedule:
(課程進度將視實際教學狀況調整)
Week 1-2: Introduction to Probability (機率簡介).
Week 3: Random Variables (隨機變數).
Week 4-6: Discrete Random Variables (離散隨機變數).
Week 7: First Midterm (第一次期中考)
Week 8-9: Continuous Random Variables (連續隨機變數).
Week 10-12: Multiple Random Variables (多維隨機變數).
Week 13: Second Midterm (第二次期中考)
Week 14-15: Sums of Random Variables (隨機變數之函數).
Week 16-17: Conditional Probability Models (條件機率模型) and Central Limited Theory (中央極限定理).
Week 18: Final Exam (期末考).
scorePolicy:
